title: Eco-Chic Duplex with Smart Home in Ustka's Port District
description: Step into modern sustainability with this architectural duplex featuring 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 stylish bathrooms. Each space is thoughtfully planned, offering abundant natural light and a seamless flow perfect for family living or entertaining guests. The residence measures a generous 134 sqm, providing both comfort and functionality. Luxurious finishes, energy-efficient solutions, and a cutting-edge smart home system complete this modern eco-conscious retreat.
neighborhood_description: Located in Ustka's calm and welcoming Port District, this property sits within a safe, community-focused locale. Enjoy the tranquil pace of a low urban area with easy access to scenic cycling paths and quick highway routes to regional business or leisure hotspots. The surroundings are ideal for those valuing peace, security, and authentic neighborly spirit.
lifestyle_benefits: commute flexibility thanks to easy highway access
healthy activities from widespread bike lanes
inviting spaces for remote work and meetings
community events in a neighborhood-focused zone
target_buyer: Ambitious entrepreneurs or sustainability-oriented families seeking a healthy balance between dynamic work-lifestyle and peaceful home base. Ideal for remote workers who favour cutting-edge technology and eco-elements within a tight-knit, safe community.
market_positioning: This eco-modern duplex stands out in Ustka's property market as an exceptional fusion of smart tech and sustainable living. Its generous size, advanced features, and strong lifestyle appeal cater to emerging demand among entrepreneurs and remote professionals prioritizing well-being, security, and green values in a competitive price range.
